meta.name: 我地 NGO DEI
meta.about: 💛我地係香港人NGO DEI a vibrant Hongkongers NGO. Join us as we redefine change through creativity📢🎨 #FreeHongKong #NGODEI #我地 #我地真係好撚鍾意香港

meta.name: NGO DEI (我地 )
meta.about:
NGO DEI @ngodei.org is a young and dynamic organization that has made a significant impact in just over two years since its establishment. With a focus on #artsandculture, we concentrate on advocating for a #freeHongKong via art, organized almost 100 events, and helped over 80 #Ukrainianmigrants settle in Europe. 
From humble beginnings of just a few international students and 3 founders, we have grown to achieve great success, and we aim to continue our important work with support from like-minded individuals. Together, we strive to make a positive impact on the world through small but impactful actions.
